xc:entity.dcterms:hasFormat: Some issues also available via Internet from the FDA web site. Address as of 8/29/99: http://www.fda.gov/cder/ndc/index.htm; current access available via PURL.
xc:entity.dcterms:description: Issues for 1971-1972 prepared by: the Office of Scientific Coordination, Bureau of Drugs, Food and Drug Administration; 1976-1985 by: the Drug Listing Branch, Food and Drug Administration; 1995- by: Product Information Management Branch, Division of Management and Budget, Center for Drug Evaluation and Research, Food and Drug Administration.
xc:entity.dcterms:relation: Vols. for 19 -1976 kept up to date by: Supplement to the ... National drug code directory, which ceased with v. 1, no. 36, Mar. 1981.
xc:entity.xc:contributor: United States. Food and Drug Administration. Science Information Facility.
United States. Food and Drug Administration. Bureau of Drugs. Office of Scientific Coordination.
United States. Food and Drug Administration. Drug Listing Branch.
Center for Drug Evaluation and Research (U.S.). Product Information Management Branch.
